reason: Task #41 (backlink_velocity_tracking) FULLY TESTED and PASSING. All 5 test steps completed successfully. Fixed TypeScript errors (TrendingUp01→TrendUp01, ctx.runQuery issues), deployed to Convex, manually triggered cron job, verified UI rendering and data display.
thinking_process: Task #41 complete with comprehensive browser testing. Issues found and fixed: 1) Icon imports (TrendingUp01→TrendUp01, TrendingDown01→TrendDown01) in VelocityMetricsCards and BacklinkVelocityChart. 2) Convex v2 compatibility - replaced ctx.runQuery with helper functions (fetchVelocityHistory, fetchGroupPerformanceHistory). 3) TypeScript strict mode - added explicit types. Deployment successful. Cron job processed 1 domain with 25 new backlinks. UI rendering perfectly: 4 velocity metric cards showing real data (25.0 new/day, 0.0 lost/day, +25.0 net growth), composed chart displaying green bars for new backlinks. Zero console errors. PRODUCTION READY.
